au_634584: -x, --extract-audio                  Convert video files to audio-only files (requires ffmpeg or avconv and ffprobe or avprobe)
    --audio-format FORMAT            Specify audio format: "best", "aac", "vorbis", "mp3", "m4a", "opus", or "wav"; "best" by default

Explanations about Options.-t:
When used as an input option (before "-i"), limit the duration of data read from the
 input file.
Explanations about Options.-h:
Show help. An optional parameter may be specified to print help about a specific item.
 If no argument is specified, only basic (non advanced) tool options are shown.
Explanations about Options.-acodec: Set the audio codec. This is an alias for "-codec:a".
Explanations about Options.-n:
Do not overwrite output files, and exit immediately if a specified output file already
 exists.
Explanations about Options.-vcodec: Set the video codec. This is an alias for "-codec:v".

Top-3 Scripts:
au_486297: youtube-dl 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -F 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f 22 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f best 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

youtube-dl -f 'bestvideo[ext=mp4]+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/bestvideo+bestaudio' --merge-output-format mp4 'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P9pzm5b6FFY'

au_634584: man youtube-dl

youtube-dl -f bestaudio --extract-audio --audio-format mp3 --audio-quality 0 <Video-URL>

youtube-dl -f bestaudio[ext=m4a] --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata <Video-URL>

youtube-dl -f bestaudio --extract-audio --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata <Video-URL>

youtube-dl -F <Video-URL>

Explanations about Options.--merge-output-format:
If a merge is required (e.g. bestvideo+bestaudio), output to given container
 format. One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv. Ignored if no merge is required
Explanations about Options.-F: List all available formats of requested videos
